puzzle.title: Salad, Delicious
puzzle.description: So, this one won't be as much of a giveaway. You might have to brute force it a bit. Here's your hint: Euxwxv.

puzzle.title: Hackerman
puzzle.description: It looks like someone hacked into this, you'll need to use the admin password to lock them out. I can't give it to you directly, they could intercept it. All I can give you is this: You already have the key, Zfok jstjqhlv jj vtnlfisLnsqcy.

puzzle.title: Spiders Love Us
puzzle.description: You know, we actually taught spiders to count once, they loved this set of numbers for some reason: 6 12 9 5 19 18 20 1 19 20 25
